title: The Word formation process used by the Indonesian youth in Facebook
abstract: This thesis mainly deals with the youthâ€™s unpublished expressions given by youth in Java Island. The focus of the analysis is on the types of expression which are used in Java Island. To analyze the Facebook data, the thesis used the thesis The Word Formation Process used by the Indonesian Youth in Facebook from Yule (1990). For the methods, I used a qualitative approach supported by quantitative data in developing my research.From the analysis, the thesis found that there were many unpublished expressions which were reduced by youth in Java Island. There were English- Indonesian unpublished expressions, Chinese- Indonesian unpublished expressions, and Javanese- Indonesian unpublished expressions. In English- Indonesian, There are 155 unpublished expressions in English. There are 14 unpublished expressions in Compounding, 1 unpublished expression in Blending, 40 unpublished expressions in Clipping, 19 unpublished expressions in Acronyms, 15 unpublished expressions in Multiple Process, and 66 unpublished expressions in Miscellaneous; in Chinese- Indonesian there are 5 unpublished expressions in miscellaneous; In Javanese- Indonesian, there are 118 unpublished expressions in Javanese. There are 3 unpublished expressions in multiple process, and 88 unpublished expressions in miscellaneous. By giving the total of word formation process, the writer gives a description how many unpublished expressions in facebook.
